name: testrun
description: A module to support a test

scripts.test: jshint index.js lib && lab -v test/byplatform.js test/format.js test/lab.js test/lab_async.js test/scriptrun.js test/lab_skip.js && lab -v test/lab_only.js && mocha test/mocha.mocha test/mocha_async.mocha test/scriptrun.mocha test/mocha_skip.mocha && mocha test/mocha_only.mocha

author: Takayuki Sato
